title: Fiora buff?
body: Would it be too OP if Fiora had her first part of He be a stun instead of a slow??

replies.body: So, any buffs to fiora or vayne make me really wary, for vayne its because her w just shreds anyone. and for iora, her passive does a smiilar thing as does her ult. balancing these two champs are probably a horrendous thing to deal with because uncounterable damage is so hard to balance properly. adding another stun to fioras kit would probably break her, especially sinceher w can block exhaust and igniste as well as abilities and autoattacks, i feel that the slow she gives it more than enough to close the distance.
